script.name: plugin.autotrade.refuel
script.description: ST LT UT: Refuel ship and followers
script.sourceplaintext:
do if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay return [TRUE] do if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay return [TRUE]
$free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay do if $free < 60 return [FALSE]
gosub sub.ComputeAmount if size of table $need.fuel $price = get max price of ware Energy Cells @ $blacklist = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.blacklistsector : Add Sector=null Is Local=[FALSE]
$destination = find station: product Energy Cells with min. jumps: max.price=$price, amount=$total.energy, max.jumps=$a.searchRadius, startsector=$a.sector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$blacklist skip if $destination -> exists $destination = find station sells: resource Energy Cells with min. jumps: max.price=$price, amount=$total.energy, max.jumps=$a.searchRadius, startsector=$a.sector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$blacklist
* search docks? if not $destination -> exists end
if $destination -> exists * if we need to jump, distrubute any spare energy $dest.sector = $destination -> get sector $needed.energy = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $dest.sector $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $spare.energy = $got.energy - $needed.energy if $spare.energy > 0 $follower = get next key: table=$need.fuel key=null while $follower $needed.energy = $follower -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $dest.sector $got.energy = $follower -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $needed.energy > $got.energy AND ( $got.energy + $spare.energy ) >= $needed.energy $needed.energy = - ( $needed.energy - $got.energy ) gosub sub.Transfer $needed.energy = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $dest.sector $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $spare.energy = $got.energy - $needed.energy end
do if $spare.energy <= 0 break $follower = get next key: table=$need.fuel key=$follower end end
$text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2091, $destination, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ if [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.moveto : Destination=$destination Allow Jump=[TRUE] if [DOCKEDAT] == $destination gosub sub.ComputeAmount = [THIS] -> buy $total.energy units of Energy Cells
$follower = get next key: table=$need.fuel key=null while $follower if $follower != [THIS] if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $follower $needed.energy = $need.fuel[$follower] $needed.energy = - $needed.energy *gosub sub.Transfer $needed.energy = [THIS] -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells if $needed.energy $needed.energy = - $needed.energy $transfered = $follower -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells $needed.energy = $needed.energy - $transfered do if $needed.energy > 0 = [THIS] -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells end end end $follower = get next key: table=$need.fuel key=$follower end
return [TRUE] end end end end return [FALSE]
sub.ComputeAmount: $need.fuel = table alloc $total.energy = 0 $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $min.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$a.minRange if $min.energy > $got.energy $needed.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$a.fuelRange $need.fuel[[THIS]] = $needed.energy $needed.energy = $needed.energy - $got.energy
$energy.price = get max price of ware Energy Cells $money = [THIS] -> get money if ( $energy.price * $needed.energy ) > $money return [FALSE] end $total.energy = $total.energy + $needed.energy end
$main.free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $main.free = $main.free - $total.energy if $main.free > 0 if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay $followers = [THIS] -> get formation follower ships if $followers $i = size of array $followers while $i do if $main.free <= 0 break dec $i = $follower = $followers[$i] skip if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $follower continue $owned = $follower -> get owner race skip if $owned == [OWNER] continue skip if $follower -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay continue $needed.energy = $follower ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$a.minRange $follower.energy = $follower -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $needed.energy > $follower.energy $needed.energy = $follower ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$a.fuelRange $needed.energy = $needed.energy - $follower.energy if $follower -> get free amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $free = $follower -> get free amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $needed.energy = get minimum, $needed.energy, $free, $main.free, null, null $need.fuel[$follower] = $needed.energy $total.energy = $total.energy + $needed.energy $main.free = $main.free - $needed.energy end end end end end end endsub
sub.Transfer: $needed.energy = [THIS] -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells if $needed.energy $needed.energy = - $needed.energy $transfered = $follower -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells $needed.energy = $needed.energy - $transfered do if $needed.energy > 0 = [THIS] -> add $needed.energy units of Energy Cells end endsub return null

comment.var: if we need to jump, distrubute any spare energy

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector
needed jump drive energy for jump to sector
needed jump drive energy for jump to sector
set command extra display override: text=

sval.val: ST LT UT: Refuel ship and followers
if we need to jump, distrubute any spare energy
